exceptions
Class ExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--exceptions.ExceptionHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
CoExceptionHandler, SQLExceptionHandler
public abstract class ExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object

This abstract class provides some default method implementations for all the exception handlers in the System. It takes care of the translation of exceptions and the exception logging.
